system.description:
Fireform. As an action, transform yourself into flames for 3 rounds. Ranged and melee attacks do half damage. Creatures using natural weapons also take [[/r 1d4]] damage if they hit. Increase damage die category on dupe. Emits light at close.

@UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.effects.Item.rIxSg9KzDGxbfHJa]{Fireform}
